Package viewtier.ui

Interface Summary
ButtonPressedEvent ButtonPressedEvent is sent to a button whenever it's pressed by client.
ButtonPressedListener  
ConversationalTierlet ConversationalTierlet is a signature interface.
Input Contact for a companent capable of changing it's value by a client
MenuSelectedEvent MenuSelectedEvent is sent to a menue whenever it's selected by client.
MenuSelectedListener  
StatelessTierlet StatelessTierlet is a signature interface.
TabSelectedEvent TabSelectedEvent is sent to Tabs component whenever a tab selected by a client.
TabSelectedListener  
Tierlet Interface Tierlet defines external representation of view.
TierletContext TierletContext defines execution context for tierlets and components.
ValueChangedListener  
 

Class Summary
AbstractInput AbstractInput is a base class incorporating functionality common for all input components.
Border  
Button Class Button is a plain vanilla button
CheckBox CheckBox is an edittable field.
Color Class Color is defines component's color.
Component Class Component is a generic component.
ConversationalTierlet.Result ConversationalTierlet.Result is a naming convinience class to hold strongly typed result codes returned by ConversationalTierlet excecute method.
DropDown  
ExecuteResult Execute is a naming convinience class to hold strongly typed result codes returned by Tierlet excecute.
Field Field is an edittable field.
FileUpload Field is an edittable field.
Flow Class Flow is a container used to create a sequential list of components.
Font Class Font defines component's font.
Font.Family This class defines typed font familly
Image  
Label  
Layout Layout defines layout of a component within a container.
Link Link component is a component to represent links
ListBox  
ListBoxItem  
Menu  
OrderedList Class List is a marked list of components.
Panel Class Panel is responsible for being a generic container for other Viewtier compents.
Parameters Parameters is a convinience class to contain list of parameters.
Password Password is an edittable field with user input displayed as starts.
RadioButton RadioButton is an edittable field.
Raw Content of the Raw component is copied directly to the client.
StatelessTierlet.Result StatelessTierlet.Result is a naming convinience class to hold strongly typed result codes returned by StatelessTierlet excecute method.
Tabs  
Text Text is an edittable field.
ValueChangedEvent ValueChangedEvent event is sent to a component when it's value was changed as a result of client's input.
Window Top-level container.
